description: Application to vary (under S19) consented works of planning permission ref: 183265LBC dated 05/12/2018 for: Demolition of two and three-storey extensions (to north and south of Place House) and replacement with part single, part two and part three-storey extensions for use as a four form entry secondary school and sixth form (840 pupils); refurbishment of Place House, garden folly and gate house; associated hardstanding and boundary treatment works; and refuse and cycle parking storage (Listed Building Consent). Amendments seek approval for alterations to reconfigure internal layout of the existing listed building (Place House) to comply with fire regulations; changes to the Main Stair, Sixth Form Study Area and the Entrance Exhibition; additional details including new fire doors, ceiling and extended repairs due to mould, and door blockages to match the existing wall construction (Variation of Listed Building Consent)
